explanation_paragraphs: 1. Look at the fur — it’s too detailed and perfectly lit for a photo.
2. Notice the eyes — they’re vibrant, reflective, and overly dramatic.
3. Check paws and whiskers — AI often distorts or misplaces details.
1. Check the hands and book — the fingers don’t press the pages realistically, and the grip feels unnatural.
2. Look at the text on the book — it’s blurry, nonsensical, and lacks coherent structure, a clear sign of AI generation.
3. Examine the lighting — it’s overly perfect and cinematic, with an unnatural glow that doesn’t match real-life conditions.
Real images don't require explanations :)
1. Notice the eyes — they’re vibrant, symmetrical, and overly reflective, giving a dramatic AI look.
2. Look at the fur — it’s sharply detailed and uniform, unlike natural textures.
3. Check the paws and yarn — the contact may seem unrealistic, lacking weight or pressure.
Real images don't require explanations :)

1. Notice the proportions — the muscles are overly exaggerated and unrealistic.
2. Check the clothing — it’s too smooth, lacking natural wrinkles or texture.
3. Look at the interaction — the hand placement and eye contact feel unnatural.
1. Notice the jersey text — it appears slightly blurry and inconsistent, a common AI artifact when rendering text.
2. Check the facial features — they may look overly smooth and lack the natural imperfections of real skin.
3. Look at the proportions — the body and limbs might appear slightly unnatural or exaggerated in size and pose.

1. Notice the hands — their positioning and anatomy may appear slightly off, with fingers that lack natural joint alignment or proportions.
2. Check the lighting — the sunset glow is overly dramatic and evenly distributed, creating an unrealistic cinematic effect.
3. Look at the background — objects like the lampposts and trees might lack depth or have minor inconsistencies in their structure.

1. Notice the face — it’s overly smooth and lacks the small imperfections typically seen in natural skin.
2. Check the text on signs — the protest signs may have blurry or nonsensical text, a common hallmark of AI-generated images.
3. Look at the crowd — the people in the background may have distorted or inconsistent facial features and lack realistic depth.

1. Notice the sand dunes — the patterns appear too uniform and perfect, lacking the natural randomness of wind-shaped sand.
2. Check the vehicles — they may lack realistic weight and interaction with the sand, such as proper tire imprints or dust dynamics.
3. Look for imperfections — notice the sand close to the car
1. Notice the children’s faces — some may appear overly smooth or have slight distortions, especially in the background.
2. Check the hands — the hands holding brushes may seem unrealistic or misshapen, a common issue in AI-generated images.
3. Look at the painting details — the brush strokes and colors may lack natural variation or appear artificially blended.
